verses.verse: וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard סַנְבַלַּ֗ט <S%H5571><s%> But it came to pass that when Sanballat כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we בוֹנִים֙ <S%H1129><s%> that we builded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> the wall וַיִּ֣חַר <S%H2734><s%> he was wroth ל֔וֹ וַיִּכְעַ֖ס <S%H3707><s%> indignation הַרְבֵּ֑ה <S%H7235><s%> and took great וַיַּלְעֵ֖ג <S%H3932><s%> and mocked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <S%H3064><s%> the Jews

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> And he spake לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֶחָ֗יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וְחֵיל֙ <S%H2426><s%> army שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מָ֛ה <S%H4100><s%> What הַיְּהוּדִ֥ים <S%H3064><s%> Jews הָאֲמֵלָלִ֖ים <S%H537><s%> these feeble עֹשִׂ֑ים <S%H6213><s%> What do הֲיַעַזְב֨וּ <S%H5800><s%> commit self לָהֶ֤ם <S%H1992><s%> they הֲיִזְבָּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H2076><s%> themselves? will they sacrifice הַיְכַלּ֣וּ <S%H3615><s%> ? will they make an end בַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age הַיְחַיּ֧וּ <S%H2421><s%> keep leave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲבָנִ֛ים <S%H68><s%> the stones מֵעֲרֵמ֥וֹת <S%H6194><s%> out of the heaps הֶעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> of the rubbish וְהֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> even שְׂרוּפֽוֹת׃ <S%H8313><s%> which are burned

וְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <S%H2900><s%> Now Tobiah הָעַמֹּנִ֖י <S%H5984><s%> the Ammonite אֶצְל֑וֹ <S%H681><s%> [was] by him וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> Even אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> they בּוֹנִ֔ים <S%H1129><s%> Even that which they build אִם־ <S%H518><s%> should יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> go up שׁוּעָ֔ל <S%H7776><s%> if a fox וּפָרַ֖ץ <S%H6555><s%> he shall even break down חוֹמַ֥ת <S%H2346><s%> wall אַבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H68><s%> their stone פ

שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> O our God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> how הָיִ֣ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> become בוּזָ֔ה <S%H939><s%> for we are despised וְהָשֵׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> and turn חֶרְפָּתָ֖ם <S%H2781><s%> their reproach אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on רֹאשָׁ֑ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their own head וּתְנֵ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> and give לְבִזָּ֖ה <S%H961><s%> them for a prey בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land שִׁבְיָֽה׃ <S%H7633><s%> of captivity

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּכַס֙ <S%H3680><s%> And cover עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֲוֹנָ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> not their iniquity וְחַטָּאתָ֖ם <S%H2403><s%> and let not their sin מִלְּפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּמָּחֶ֑ה <S%H4229><s%> be blotted out כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הִכְעִ֖יסוּ <S%H3707><s%> thee for they have provoked [thee] to anger לְנֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> about הַבּוֹנִֽים׃ <S%H1129><s%> before the builders

וַנִּבְנֶה֙ <S%H1129><s%> So built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> we the wall וַתִּקָּשֵׁ֥ר <S%H7194><s%> was joined together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole הַחוֹמָ֖ה <S%H2346><s%> and all the wall עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against חֶצְיָ֑הּ <S%H2677><s%> unto the half וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> had לֵ֦ב <S%H3820><s%> had a mind לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> thereof for the people לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to work פ

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become כַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard סַנְבַלַּ֡ט <S%H5571><s%> But it came to pass [that] when Sanballat וְ֠טוֹבִיָּה <S%H2900><s%> and Tobiah וְהָעַרְבִ֨ים <S%H6163><s%> and the Arabians וְהָעַמֹּנִ֜ים <S%H5984><s%> and the Ammonites וְהָאַשְׁדּוֹדִ֗ים <S%H796><s%> and the Ashdodites כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָלְתָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> went אֲרוּכָה֙ <S%H724><s%> the repair לְחֹמ֣וֹת <S%H2346><s%> that the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵחֵ֥לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> began הַפְּרֻצִ֖ים <S%H6555><s%> [and] that the breaches לְהִסָּתֵ֑ם <S%H5640><s%> to be stopped וַיִּ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> wroth לָהֶ֖ם מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> then they were very

וַיִּקְשְׁר֤וּ <S%H7194><s%> And conspired כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> all of them together לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> [and] to fight בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> cause ל֖וֹ תּוֹעָֽה׃ <S%H8442><s%> A disturbance

וַנִּתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <S%H6419><s%> Nevertheless we made our prayer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> unto our God וַנַּעֲמִ֨יד <S%H5975><s%> and set מִשְׁמָ֧ר <S%H4929><s%> a watch עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> and because יוֹמָ֥ם <S%H3119><s%> against them day וָלַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> because

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah כָּשַׁל֙ <S%H3782><s%> is decayed כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> The strength הַסַּבָּ֔ל <S%H5449><s%> of the bearers of burdens וְהֶעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> rubbish הַרְבֵּ֑ה <S%H7235><s%> and [there is] much וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> ourselves לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not נוּכַ֔ל <S%H3201><s%> so that we are not able לִבְנ֖וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּחוֹמָֽה׃ <S%H2346><s%> the wall

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> said צָרֵ֗ינוּ <S%H6862><s%> And our adversaries לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> They will not יֵדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> They shall not know וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> neither see עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> till we come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in תּוֹכָ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וַהֲרַגְנ֑וּם <S%H2026><s%> them and slay וְהִשְׁבַּ֖תְנוּ <S%H7673><s%> to cease אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> them and cause the work

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <S%H3064><s%> And it came to pass that when the Jews הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt אֶצְלָ֑ם <S%H681><s%> by them וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> they said לָ֙נוּ֙ עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> unto us ten פְּעָמִ֔ים <S%H6471><s%> times מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַמְּקֹמ֖וֹת <S%H4725><s%> From all places אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where תָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> whence ye shall return עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וָֽאַעֲמִ֞יד <S%H5975><s%> Therefore set מִֽתַּחְתִּיּ֧וֹת <S%H8482><s%> I in the lower לַמָּק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> places מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> behind לַחוֹמָ֖ה <S%H2346><s%> the wall [בַּצְּחִחִיִּים כ] (בַּצְּחִיחִ֑ים <S%H6708><s%> higher place ק) וָֽאַעֲמִ֤יד <S%H5975><s%> I even set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people לְמִשְׁפָּח֔וֹת <S%H4940><s%> after their families עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with חַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H2719><s%> with their swords רָמְחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7420><s%> their spears וְקַשְּׁתֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7198><s%> and their bows

וָאֵ֣רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And I looked וָאָק֗וּם <S%H6965><s%> and rose up וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַחֹרִ֤ים <S%H2715><s%> unto the nobles וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַסְּגָנִים֙ <S%H5461><s%> and to the rulers וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and to the rest הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> Be not ye afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> of them אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנָ֞י <S%H136><s%> the Lord הַגָּד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [which is] great וְהַנּוֹרָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> and terrible זְכֹ֔רוּ <S%H2142><s%> remember וְהִֽלָּחֲמ֗וּ <S%H3898><s%> and fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> for your brethren בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H1121><s%> your sons וּבְנֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> and your daughters נְשֵׁיכֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> your wives וּבָתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1004><s%> and your houses פ

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard אוֹיְבֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H341><s%> And it came to pass when our enemies כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it was נ֣וֹדַֽע <S%H3045><s%> that it was known לָ֔נוּ וַיָּ֥פֶר <S%H6565><s%> to nought הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> unto us and God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצָתָ֑ם <S%H6098><s%> their counsel [וַנָּשׁוּב כ] (וַנָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> break ק) כֻּלָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> all of us to the wall אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his מְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4399><s%> unto his work

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> that הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass from that time הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> forth [that] the half נְעָרַי֮ <S%H5288><s%> of my servants עֹשִׂ֣ים <S%H6213><s%> wrought בַּמְּלָאכָה֒ <S%H4399><s%> in the work וְחֶצְיָ֗ם <S%H2677><s%> and the other half מַחֲזִיקִים֙ <S%H2388><s%> of them held וְהָרְמָחִ֣ים <S%H7420><s%> both the spears הַמָּגִנִּ֔ים <S%H4043><s%> the shields וְהַקְּשָׁת֖וֹת <S%H7198><s%> and the bows וְהַשִּׁרְיֹנִ֑ים <S%H8302><s%> and the habergeons וְהַ֨שָּׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> and the rulers אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> [were] behind כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> all the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

הַבּוֹנִ֧ים <S%H1129><s%> They which builded בַּחוֹמָ֛ה <S%H2346><s%> on the wall וְהַנֹּשְׂאִ֥ים <S%H5375><s%> and they that bare בַּסֶּ֖בֶל <S%H5447><s%> burdens עֹמְשִׂ֑ים <S%H6006><s%> with those that laded בְּאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> [every one] with one יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> of his hands עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> wrought בַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> in the work וְאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> and with the other מַחֲזֶ֥קֶת <S%H2388><s%> [hand] held הַשָּֽׁלַח׃ <S%H7973><s%> a weapon

וְהַ֨בּוֹנִ֔ים <S%H1129><s%> For the builders אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one חַרְבּ֛וֹ <S%H2719><s%> had his sword אֲסוּרִ֥ים <S%H631><s%> girded עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מָתְנָ֖יו <S%H4975><s%> by his side וּבוֹנִ֑ים <S%H1129><s%> and [so] builded וְהַתּוֹקֵ֥עַ <S%H8628><s%> And he that sounded בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> the trumpet אֶצְלִֽי׃ <S%H681><s%> [was] by me

וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> And I said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַחֹרִ֤ים <S%H2715><s%> unto the nobles וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַסְּגָנִים֙ <S%H5461><s%> and to the rulers וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and to the rest הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people הַמְּלָאכָ֥ה <S%H4399><s%> The work הַרְבֵּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> [is] great וּרְחָבָ֑ה <S%H7342><s%> and large וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we נִפְרָדִים֙ <S%H6504><s%> and we are separated עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> upon the wall רְחוֹקִ֖ים <S%H7350><s%> far from אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one מֵאָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> another
